required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long Term Use Of Xalacom In Patients Glaucoma Or Ocular Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: Special Investigation Of Long Term Use Of Xalacom(Regulatory Post Marketing Commitment Plan)

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this Investigation is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of long-term treatment with Xalacom in medical practice. Also, occurrence of unknown and known adverse drug reactions (ADRs) in subjects treated with Xalacom will be monitored during the survey period, and whether an additional treatment outcome investigation and/or a post-marketing clinical study is required in the future will be determined.

detailed_description.textblock: All the patients whom an investigator prescribes the first Xalacom® should be registered consecutively until the number of subjects reaches target number in order to extract patients enrolled into the investigation at random.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of adverse drug reactions.
Adverse drug reaction not expected from the LPD (unknown adverse drug reaction).
Efficacy rate for the patients of glaucoma or ocular hypertension.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Latan-timolol maleate fixed comb ophthalmic solution

intervention.intervention_name: Latanoprost-timolol maleate fixed combination ophthalmic solution
intervention.description: Xalacom® Combination Eye Drops depending on the Investigator prescription. Frequency and duration are according to Package Insert as follows. "One drop should be applied to the affected eye(s) once daily".
intervention.arm_group_label: Latan-timolol maleate fixed comb ophthalmic solution

study_pop.textblock: The patients whom an investigator involving A6641056 prescribes the Xalacom® Combination Eye Drops.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients need to be administered Xalacom® in order to be enrolled in the surveillance.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients not administered Xalacom®.

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

clinical_study.keyword: Xalacom Regulatory post marketing commitment plan safety
